title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Flooding and Flooded Communities
purpose: The APPG aims to discuss further flood prevention across the UK to minimise the impact of flooding on the public and businesses. The APPG aims to represent flooded communities, provide a forum for debate, access to specialist information, and help shape future policy to support those most impacted by flooding.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 6104.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Tracey Garrett, National Flood Forum. Tel: 01299 403 055
contact_details.secretariat: National Flood Forum acts as the group's secretariat. https://nationalfloodforum.org.uk/
